summary: Two brothers, 23 and 16, who are both teen idols, come to terms with their dysfunctional family past and deep affection for each other.
cast: Bryce Johnson|Cole Williams|Rain Phoenix|Katherine Ellis|Roni Deitz|Tom Gilroy|Michelle Phillips|Justin Zachary|Max Piscioneri|Mark L. Young|Alfredo Aja|Dino D'Auri|Angelita Macias|Miguel de Malaga
keywords: brother brother incest|dysfunctional family|boy band|voice over narration|marijuana
title: Harry and Max
